title: Calories in Sausage McMuffin
meta_description: Discover calories in mcmuffin sausage, including full nutrition breakdown like protein, fat, carbs, and sodium for one serving, plus tweaks and FAQs.
assumptions: Standard McDonald's Sausage McMuffin: English muffin, pork sausage patty, American cheese; as prepared and served.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, customizations, portion size, and preparation; check McDonald's app or labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One Sausage McMuffin provides ~400 kcal, 14 g protein, and 26 g fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Whole wheat muffin instead of white

faqs.q: How many calories in one mcmuffin sausage?
faqs.a: About 400 kcal for a standard Sausage McMuffin.

faqs.q: What is the protein in Sausage McMuffin?
How much sodium is in calories in mcmuffin sausage?
faqs.a: Around 680 mg sodium, mostly from the sausage and cheese.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in Sausage McMuffin?
faqs.a: Yes, about 29 g carbs, mainly from the English muffin.

faqs.q: Does Sausage McMuffin have trans fat?
faqs.a: Typically 0 g trans fat, but check for updates in recipes.
